PSDConvert

psdtopng.py

Convert psd file to png files with position

require:psd-tools

Command 'python psdtopng.py 1.psd' , Then,you will get all the png files from psd . Format:png_x_y_width_height.png

pngcolor.py

Get colors from image file.

require:psd-tools,Tkinter

Command 'python pngcolor.py', select a image file ,you will see the image. Click left mouse key,get the color of the point. Click right mouse key,save as out.jpg with the color (hex format '#FFFFFF').

Enjoy it.
